thread.section_title: GigSalad Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GigSalad | www.gigsalad.com
thread.title: Aireen Calimbahin

author: Aireen Calimbahin
title: Aireen Calimbahin
text: I was on the hunt to find a hair and make-up artist for our 25th Silver Wedding Vow Renewal Ceremony. I have previously arranged with 2 other ladies but they have stopped communicating with me. I didn't know gigsalad exists until I googled "bridal hair and make-up artist near me." Within mins. of signing up I received Quote: s and within a day I booked with someone. She sent me photos of her work and answered my questions in a very timely manner.
